text: Tini tomadera upara harama karechena, mrta jiba, rakta, sukara mansa ebam sesaba jiba-jantu ya allaha byatita apara karo name utsarga kara haya. Abasya ye loka anan'yopaya haye pare ebam napharamani o simalanghanakari na haya, tara jan'ya kona papa ne'i. Nihsandehe allaha mahana ksamasila, atyanta dayalu.
